title: New: Duckwrth – I'M DEAD
body:
LA’s **Duckwrth** channels some seriously funky vibes on latest track, _I’M DEAD_.

With the songwriting drawing from Chance’s addictive brand of upbeat pop infused hip hop, the delivery feels more in line with early Kendrick tracks – with just enough mainstream appeal to open up Duckwrth’s sound to a wider audience. Check it out below.

excerpt.full: LA’s Duckwrth channels some seriously funky vibes on latest track, I’M DEAD. With the songwriting drawing from Chance’s addictive brand of upbeat pop infused hip hop, the delivery feels more in line with early Kendrick tracks – with just enough mainstream appeal to open up Duckwrth’s sound to a wider audience. Check it out below.
